name: Classic Car Racing (itch)
description:
Classic Car Racing

The real racing game

Remember the great racing games of the 80's with Classic Car Racing.

Scroll through the streets of major cities in the world desviandos cars, ambulances, motorcycles and trucks trying

achieve the maximum score to register it in the record.

If you like old games where the gameplay and fun are the main attractions,

Classic Car Racing is the perfect game for you. With a simple and addictive gameplay this amazing game will provide many hours of challenge.
